column4: Hello all! I have an issue with Ubuntu - it suddenly freezes after I start FireFox (or anything related to Internet) Now it dod not crash and I looked up syslog - thats what it says http://paste.ubuntu.com/664341/ Anyone an advice what to do? (Ubuntu 11.04)
I'm having the same problems with Firefox (even with Chromium)
I dont think your system freezes :P Or does it?
no, my system won't freeze, only my browser. I need firebug :P
